thread.title: Black woman's racist rant on a London bus
thread.title_full: Black woman's racist rant on a London bus

title: Black woman's racist rant on a London bus
text: 21:07 BBC said: Footage showing a woman's anti-Muslim tirade on a London bus has prompted a discussion about the fact that the abusive woman is black.The video was filmed on a bus in north-west London and uploaded to Facebook on Wednesday. It starts with a woman in the middle of a rant. She's shouting and swearing at a pregnant Muslim woman, and threatening to kick her in the stomach. From here:Video here (NSFW btw): http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=3cb_1445016601 Much is made of the fact the woman is black. It's as though there's a shock that people other than white Brits are racist. The woman was especially nasty.
